comments.html:
Yes and Yes ;)

Sometimes I feel like half of the code of optional configuration modules is input validation. Don't take my word for it, there's a reason the code is on GitHub.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Wondering if you do any user input validation from those YAML formatted files with netsim first? Or is it user's responsibility to provide correct input values?
